summary: This appears to be an email or internal communication regarding Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It references the discontinuation of 'Psych Ops' on July 30, 2018, and is addressed to an Associate Warden at the facility.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the communication, identified by his registration number 76318-054, which is associated with his incarceration at MCC New York.

events.title: Psych Ops Discontinued
events.description: Psychological operations or monitoring on Jeffrey Epstein were discontinued at 8:15 am.

events.title: Communication Regarding Epstein
events.description: An email or internal memo was sent regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status or conditions at MCC New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons registration number was 76318-054.
Epstein was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
A program or monitoring referred to as 'Psych Ops' was discontinued on July 30, 2018, at 8:15 am.
The communication is dated August 10, 2019, which is shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The correspondence involves an Associate Warden at MCC New York, indicating internal prison administration discussions about Epstein.
